page.title: 06A CHILD'S LIFE IN DACRE.
page.content: I normally get up at 7:40am.dress and go downstairs for breakfast of a sandwich and some coffee then go training I run for about a mile.Then mum takes me to the mini bus pick up point the mini bus carries 13 children and takes about 20 minutes to the school in Stainton.At school as it is summer I help to check the swimming pool water for chlorine levels and filling the footbath. Lessons include mathematics and English and tv. programmes.I take part in the school assembly.Morning playtime is at 10:15 to 10:30am.We use the computer then go swimming.At 12:00 we have dinner at school and a playtime until 1:00pm. afternoon schoolwork includes projects which involve reading and reasearch art or drawing .Afternoon playtime is 2:00 to 2:15pm.School ends at 3:15pm.
